skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: urdu radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Our Urdu radio station is dedicated to broadcasting Islamic content where we offer a range of spiritually enriching programs. The station features daily Quran recitations with authentic Tajweed, allowing listeners to connect deeply with the holy text. It also airs Islamic lectures (Bayaans) from renowned scholars, covering various aspects of faith, Islamic jurisprudence, and moral guidance. Additional programs include discussions on Hadith, Seerah (life of Prophet Muhammad) and spiritual topics to foster a deeper understanding of Islam. The content is aimed at Urdu-speaking audiences, promoting Islamic teachings and values while providing a source of religious knowledge and inspiration.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
